SELECT 'Project-Task' AS type, m_prj_task.id AS typeId, s_user.username AS createdUser, s_user.avatarId AS createdUserAvatarId, concat(s_user.firstname, ' ', LTRIM(concat(IFNULL(s_user.middlename, ''), ' ')), s_user.lastname) AS createdUserDisplayName, m_prj_task.createdTime, m_prj_task.lastUpdatedTime, m_prj_task.name, m_prj_task.description AS description, m_prj_project.id AS projectId, m_prj_project.name AS projectName, m_prj_project.shortname AS projectShortName, m_prj_task.taskkey AS extraTypeId FROM m_prj_task LEFT OUTER JOIN s_user ON (m_prj_task.createdUser = s_user.username) INNER JOIN m_prj_project ON (m_prj_task.projectId = m_prj_project.id)
